sledgehammer.language

Class LanguagePackage

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.language.LanguagePackage

  • public class LanguagePackage
extends java.lang.Object
    LanguagePackage is a utility that provides the ability to substitute sections of a string recursively. This allows for Strings to be dynamically edited, and defined anywhere within the String to be injected with EntryFields. Adding to this is the ability to select what Language to choose from, falling back to English if not defined.
    Author:
    Jab

        public LanguagePackage(java.io.File directory,
                       java.lang.String name)
        Main constructor.
        Parameters:
        directory - The File Object for the directory where the LanguageFiles are stored.
        name - The String name of the LanguagePackage. This is noted in the LanguageFiles as "{{name}}_{{language_abbreviation}}.yml"

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Player player,
                        java.lang.String key,
                        Language language,
                        EntryField... entries)
        Sends a processed String Message to a Player with a given Language, and additionally defined EntryFields.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player to send the String message.
        key - The String identity of the entry to process.
        language - The Language to use for the Player.
        entries - The EntryList Array of any additional entries to process with the String message.

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(Player player,
                        java.lang.String key,
                        EntryField... entries)
        Sends a processed String Message to a Player with a English Language, and additionally defined EntryFields.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player to send the String message.
        key - The String identity of the entry to process.
        entries - The EntryList Array of any additional entries to process with the String message.

      • getAnyString

        public java.lang.String getAnyString(java.lang.String key)
        Parameters:
        key - The String identity of the entry to process.
        Returns:
        Returns a processed String. If the English LanguageFile does not contain an entry for the given String identity, other LanguageFiles are checked. If none of the remaining LanguageFiles contains an entry, null is returned.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key)
        Parameters:
        key - The String identity of the entry to process.
        Returns:
        Returns a processed String in the English LanguageFile. If the LanguageFile does not contain an entry, null is returned.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key,
                                  Language language,
                                  EntryField... entries)
        Parameters:
        key - The String identity of the entry to process.
        language - The Language to search for the String entry primarily.
        entries - Any additional EntryFields that add to or override the LanguagePackage library.
        Returns:
        Returns a processed String in the given Language. If the LanguageFile does not contain an entry, null is returned.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key,
                                  EntryField... entries)
        Parameters:
        key - The String identity of the entry to process.
        entries - Any additional EntryFields that add to or override the LanguagePackage library.
        Returns:
        Returns a processed String in the English LanguageFile. If the LanguageFile does not contain an entry, null is returned.

        language - The Language to search for the String entry primarily.
        Returns:

      • getDirectory

        public java.io.File getDirectory()
        Returns:

      • getPackageName

        public java.lang.String getPackageName()
        Returns:
        Returns the String name of the LibraryPackage. This is noted in the LanguageFile's as "{{name}}_{{language_abbreviation}}.yml"

      • processString

        public static java.lang.String processString(java.lang.String value,
                                             LanguagePackage languagePackage,
                                             Language language,
                                             EntryField... entries)
        Processes a String with the LanguagePackage library, using the given Language as an option. Any EntryField's passed to this method override entries already defined in the LanguagePackage provided.
        Parameters:
        value - The String to be processed.
        languagePackage - The LanguagePackage library to reference for any EntryField's not defined that are requested.
        language - The Language to use primarily. If EntryField's are not defined, and the LanguageFile referenced using the Language provided does not have a definition, then the LanguagePackage's English LanguageFile is checked for that definition.
        entries - The EntryField Array to add to or override the LanguagePackage library if passed.
        Returns:
        Returns the processed String value.
